the legos of all personal knowledge management systems ğŸ§  it unifies the utility of notion w/ the heroic principles of obsidian to provide an ultra granular/customizable interface that allows you organize/systemize just about any type of data you can throw at it ğŸ—‚ while notion excels at creating/managing databases + obsidian shines at seamlessly composing + linking documentations, anytype is the perfect union of the two w/ its space~wide parameter system ğŸ§± every unit of information is an object, every object has a type, and relations define + link objects ğŸ— the power of modularity this basic system provides is what truly makes anytype the legos of all pkm’s/second~brain apps ğŸ‘‘ at the core of its superpowers are its superhero principles ~ local first, peer2peer, encrypted, open~sourced, and free [limitless functionality] ğŸ’ anytype has become the focal point of my entire [productivity] system + it is impossible to overstate how much i admire/adore the product the fine folks behind anytype have created ğŸ™ğŸ½ thank you, anytype team âœ¨

“the legos of all personal knowledge management systems ğŸ§  it unifies the utility of notion w/ the heroic principles of obsidian to provide an ultra granular/customizable interface that allows you organize/systemize just about any type of data you can throw at it ğŸ—‚ while notion excels at creating/managing databases + obsidian shines at seamlessly composing + linking documentations, anytype is the perfect union of the two w/ its space~wide parameter system ğŸ§± every unit of information is an object, every object has a type, and relations define + link objects ğŸ— the power of modularity this basic system provides is what truly makes anytype the legos of all pkm’s/second~brain apps ğŸ‘‘ at the core of its superpowers are its superhero principles ~ local first, peer2peer, encrypted, open~sourced, and free [limitless functionality] ğŸ’ anytype has become the focal point of my entire [productivity] system + it is impossible to overstate how much i admire/adore the product the fine folks behind anytype have created ğŸ™ğŸ½ thank you, anytype team âœ¨”
